name: Team Naps Presents: F.U.N.
description:
You find yourself locked within a mysterious structure and have no means to escape... at least, not by yourself. You and a partner, lost inside their own structure, must work together to search for an exit. 

Team Naps Presents: F.U.N. is an online multiplayer first-person shooter escape room game where two players cooperate to solve puzzles.  There's no direct communication, so they must rely on clairvoyance and/or split screen peeking to figure out how to progress. The diabolically silly puzzles require heavy use of shooting skill and spatial logic to solve.

Will you succumb to boundless human stupidity, or discover what lies beyond the walls of F.U.N.?

This game was made for the #7DFPS 2020 game jam with the prompt No Rules No Theme.
